title: Combine autograd.Leaf and autograd.Variable
body_html:
Prior to this change, there was a circular reference between Leaf and
Variable. This means that the objects (and referenced Tensors) are not
collected as soon as they go out of scope, which lead to higher memory
usage and out-of-memory errors.

This is basically what @apaszke and I discussed on Friday, but now Variable no longer extends Function. This makes more sense to me, since it a Variable isn't a Function, and shouldn't have all the methods Function provides. Instead they both provide a few common functions/field (_do_backward, previous_functions)
